feature_section.title: Key Features of OneArcade
feature_section.image_alt: Two casino players enjoying a game of poker
feature_section.fallback_text: Experience the future of decentralized gaming
feature_section.comparison_subtitle: A New Era of Fair Gaming
feature_section.summary: OneArcade leverages One Chain Network Blockchain to provide a transparent, provably fair gaming experience with DeFi integration, allowing players to earn passive income through staking.
feature_section.feature1_description: All games use verifiable on-chain randomness through our Pyth Entropy, ensuring complete transparency and fairness in every outcome.
feature_section.feature2_description: Stake tokens across multiple chains to earn OCT tokens while playing your favorite games with minimal slippage.
feature_section.feature3_description: Enjoy flexible withdrawals, transparent bonus schemes, and full control over your assets through decentralized management.

how_it_works_section.title: How OneArcade Works
how_it_works_section.subtitle: Experience the future of decentralized gaming through our streamlined four-step process designed for both beginners and experienced players
how_it_works_section.step1_description: Link any wallet in seconds to unlock the full OneArcade experience. We support Keyless login Walets, MetaMask and all major Web3 wallets.
how_it_works_section.step2_description: Power your gameplay with OCT tokens of One Chain Network.
how_it_works_section.step3_description: Dive into /games tab of provably fair games including Roulette, Plinko, Mines and Spin Wheel. Every game provides real-time stats and detailed history.
how_it_works_section.step4_description: Win OCT tokens and unlock exclusive perks through our multi-tiered loyalty program. Earn cashback on losses and gain access to tournaments.

provably_fair_section.title: Pyth Entropy Powered Fairness
provably_fair_section.what_is_description: Pyth Entropy is a decentralized randomness service that provides cryptographically secure random numbers on-chain. It aggregates randomness from multiple sources and makes it available to smart contracts on One Chain Network.
provably_fair_section.why_matters_feature1: Cryptographically secure randomness from multiple sources
provably_fair_section.why_matters_feature3: High throughput suitable for gaming applications
provably_fair_section.why_matters_feature4: Immune to manipulation by players, casino, or validators
provably_fair_section.why_matters_feature5: Complete audit trail from request to result
provably_fair_section.step1_description: When you start a game, a randomness request is sent to Pyth Network Entropy on One Chain Network. The request includes a custom gas limit and required fee.
provably_fair_section.step2_description: Pyth Network provides cryptographically secure randomness derived from multiple data sources, ensuring provably fair results with on-chain verification.
provably_fair_section.step3_description: All randomness requests and results are recorded on One Chain Network blockchain, providing complete transparency and verifiability.
provably_fair_section.step4_description: Each game result includes request ID, sequence number, and transaction hash for complete transparency and verifiability.

testimonials_section.title: What Our Winners Say
testimonials_section.subtitle: Real stories from real players winning big on the most transparent blockchain casino platform
testimonials_section.success_stories_subtitle: Join thousands of players experiencing fair gaming with provably random outcomes and instant withdrawals.
testimonials_section.testimonial1_text: OneArcade offers the most transparent gaming experience I've found on One Chain Network. The provably fair system gives me confidence that games are legitimate, and I've already won over 500 OCT tokens!
testimonials_section.testimonial2_text: I love the token staking feature. Being able to earn passive income while also playing games creates a unique dual-earning opportunity that other platforms don't offer.
testimonials_section.testimonial3_text: The DeFi lending integration is brilliant. I was able to use my collateral to borrow OCT for games, and when I won big, I paid back the loan and kept the profits. Smart financial gaming!
testimonials_section.testimonial4_text: Weekly tournaments are extremely fun and well organized. The prize pools are generous, and the community is friendly and competitive in a good way.

roulette_page.european_roulette_description_1: European Roulette with a single zero and just no house edge - better odds than traditional casinos. Provably fair and powered by Aptos on-chain randomness module blockchain technology.

strategy_guide.title: Cosmic Strategy Guide
strategy_guide.description: Popular betting strategies to enhance your roulette experience. Remember that no strategy can overcome the house edge entirely.
strategy_guide.important_text: These strategies can enhance entertainment. Always gamble responsibly and set clear limits for your play.

martingale.title: Martingale System
martingale.description: Double your bet after each loss until you win, recovering all previous losses plus a profit equal to the original bet.
cons: Requires large bankroll for long losing streaks
martingale.example: Start with $1 bet. Lose, bet $2. Lose, bet $4. Win $4 bet, recover $7 total ($1+2+4) plus $1 profit.

dalembert.title: D'Alembert System
dalembert.description: Increase bet by one unit after loss, decrease by one unit after win. More conservative than Martingale.
pros: Works well for even money bets
cons: Still vulnerable to long losing streaks
dalembert.example: Start with $5 bet. Lose, bet $6. Lose, bet $7. Win $7 bet, decrease to $6 next bet.

fibonacci.title: Fibonacci System
fibonacci.description: Follow the Fibonacci sequence for bet sizing. Move forward two numbers after loss, back one after win.
fibonacci.example: Sequence: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13... Bet $1, lose, bet $1. Lose, bet $2. Win, go back one: bet $1.

james_bond.title: James Bond Strategy
james_bond.description: Complex strategy covering multiple bet types simultaneously with a $200 bankroll for higher payout potential.
james_bond.example: With $200: $140 on high numbers (19-36), $50 on 6-number bet (13-18), $10 on 0 for insurance.

oscar_grind.title: Oscar's Grind
oscar_grind.description: Increase bet by one unit after win, reset to original after reaching profit target. Conservative progression.
oscar_grind.example: Start with $5 bet. Win, increase to $10. Lose, stay at $10. Win, increase to $15. Reach profit goal, reset to $5.
